div.p: One Version to Rule Them All
Start with base image Install application Snapshot image Spin up new instances from snapshot
Different OS platforms are provided by each cloud provider
Once a snapshot is made, it is difficult (or impossible) to move that image to another provider
Automation tools can help, but require set up for each cloud environment
Apply Software Configuration Management (SCM) concepts to managing the entire system
Version control binary objects Use versioned groups of these binary objects
to express what belongs in the system Build deployment images from these groups
